pages.text: The Reshaping Rite commemorates the feast on Janus, and the ascension of the Angel.$(br)In this step of an ascension, the initiate will change their body to accept more powerful energies.$(br)This is done with the $(marked)Reshaping Rite$().

In order to fulfill the rite, several criteria must be met:$(li)the one to be reshaped must hold a $(l:alchemy/entry_phial_nectar)Phial of Nectar$() and $(l:alchemy/entry_flesh_lamb)Flesh of the Lamb$()$(li)the one to be reshaped must have $(l:vitalis/entry_ascension_mind)rethought$()$(li)the target must have $(marked)potential$() and $(li)all aspects needed for the rite must be present.

The last condition is probably the hardest to achieve, as it $(l)will$() require the help of $(l:lessons/lesson_recruiting)Cultists$()... or other means.$(br)In order to recruit all these cultists, the needed $(marked)$(t:The Hammer of Heat, the Heart of Stone, and the Splendorous Eye)Rite Tools$() must also be obtained.
$(o)Skin like clay, a molten heart of iron$()
